She is a tailor and sews traditional women dresses. She sews attractive up-to-date dresses and has permanent clients. She sews at home and takes orders at her apartment.

Unfortunately, her apartment is not in good condition to both serve her clients and to live. She wants to repair her apartment and so asked a loan from Kiva lenders to repair her apartment. She awaits your kindness. She hopes to live in and take orders from clients in better conditions in her apartment.

loans.use: to repair her apartment

loans.name: Aiperi

texts.ru: Айпери, 23 года, замужем, ждут первенца. У нее среднее образование, вместе с мужем занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Айпери, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 50 овец. На 0,38 Га собственной земли выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айпери обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян и топлива для обработки почвы. Айпери является участником группы "Бай Дыйкан А4", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 3 человека, всего их 4. Доходы от кредита Айпери планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и покупку дополнительного земельного надела.
texts.en: Aiperi is 23 years old, married and expecting her first child. She has a secondary education and, together with her husband, works in animal husbandry and crop cultivation. Thanks to Aiperi's persistent hard work, today she has fifty sheep on the farm. She grows haricot on 0.38 hectares of her own land. Her monthly income is 6,000 som (KGS). In order to continue to further develop her farm, Aiperi applied to the bank Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer, seeds and fuel for land cultivation. Aiperi is a member of the group 'Bai Dykan A4', in which consists of 3 people excluding her, and 4 altogether. With income from the loan, Aiperi plans to invest in the further development of her business, and purchase an additional plot of land.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds and fuel for land cultivation and growing organic haricot.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for milk production and increase the number of litres of milk supplied to his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional stock of cereals for sale in the market and meet the demands of his customers

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гулнара, 37 лет, замужем, 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 30 овец, корова. На 2,52 Га собственной земли выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,700 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулнара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян и топлива для обработки почвы. Гулнара является участником группы "Бай Дыйкан А4", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 3 человека, всего их 4. Доходы от кредита Гулнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и постройку теплицы.
texts.en: Gulnara is 37 years old, and married with two children. She has a secondary education, and works in animal husbandry and crop cultivation. Thanks to her persistent hard work, today she has thirty sheep and cows on the farm. She grows haricot on 2.52 hectares of her own land. Her monthly income is 7,700 som (KGS). In order to further develop her farm, Gulnara applied to the bank Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS), to buy fertilizers, seeds and fuel for land cultivation. Gulnara is a member of the group 'Bai Dykan A4', which consists of 3 members excluding her, and 4 altogether. With income from the loan, Gulnara plans to invest in the further development of her business and construction of a greenhouse.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds and fuel for land cultivation and growing organic haricot.

loans.name: Sanang's Group

texts.en:
Sanang is 47 years old and is a married father of three children, living in Battambang province. 

Rice farming, growing mushrooms, and teaching have been the sources of his family’s income for more than five years. He can earn about 50,000 KHR per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, he is now applying for a Kiva loan via VisionFund in order to buy seeds and fertilizer and to pay for plowing costs. 

He hopes his business will be expanded through this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer, and to pay for plowing costs

loans.name: Natividad De Jesus

texts.es:
Natividad, de 38 años de edad, está soltero, vive con su mamá y un hermano.

Natividad, tiene una tienda desde hace 3 años, también se dedica a cultivar plantas ornamentales.- La tienda está en su casa y su hermano le ayuda a atender clientes.

Natividad, necesita el crédito para comprar bolsas y plantas de café, para aumentar la cantidad de plantas en su pequeño vivero, de esa manera tendrá más ingresos a futuro. 

El cliente sueña con tener una tienda grande y así darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Natividad is 38 years old, single, and he lives with his mother and a brother.

He's had a shop for three years and he also grows ornamental plants. His shop is located at home, and his brother helps him serve the clients.

Natividad needs the loan to buy potting bags and coffee plants. He will increase the quantity of plants in his small nursery, so that he can generate more income in the future. 

His dream is to have a big shop, and thus provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy potting bags and coffee plants.

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru:
Эту женщину зовут Зебинисо. Она 36 летняя жительница района Шахритус. Зебинисо замужем и мать 5 детей. Муж строительный мастер на районе. Дети ходят в школу. 
Зебинисо 5 лет своей жизни продвигает торговую деятельность. Она решила заниматься этой деятельностью, потому что ее свекров работала именно в этой сфере. И она научила Зебинисо правильно общаться с клиентами и вести данный бизнес. 
Зебинисо занимается продажей детских разной одежды. Она решила расширить деятельность и увеличить товар. Зебинисо надеется с увеличением товара, увеличится доход, и может улучшить условия жизни семью. За счет кредита она перевозит больше детских одежды на продажу.
texts.en:
This woman's name is Zebiniso. She is a 36-year-old resident of the Shahrituz district. Zebiniso is married and a mother of 5 children. Her husband is a construction worker is the district, and children attend school.

Zebiniso has been running a retail business for 5 years of her life. She decided to get involved in this business because her mother-in-law worked precisely in this area. She is the one who taught Zebiniso how to treat customers right and run this business.

Zebiniso is involved in selling various children's clothing. She decided to expand her business and increase her merchandise selection. Zebiniso hopes that with increased selection, her income will increase and her family's life will improve. She will use this loan to bring in more children's clothing for resale.

loans.use: to bring in children's clothing for resale

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 34-year-old married man from Jabalia city. Ibrahim lives with his wife in a small, simple house.

He works in the public sector, where he gets a low income that is unstable. This income barely covers all the family needs. 

Ibrahim took a 500 USD loan fram FATEN to buy a new solar system, which will help him to provide hot water for the family without using electricity.

Ibrahim appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new solar system

loans.name: Thoeun's Group

texts.en:
Thoeun, 36, is a married mother of two children, living in Battambang province. Feeding 17 pigs to sell and working for other farms have been the sources of her family’s income for ten years. 

Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group of four to apply for this loan, with her portion to buy pig feed for her pigs. She hopes that she can earn more income and have a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Marifat

texts.en:
Marifat is a generous woman. She was born in a southern part of Tajikistan in 1989. She is living in small, attractive town with beautiful scenes of nature. She is married and has two children. She has an experience of trading kid’s clothing in a domestic market. She buys from wholesalers at the central market and sells at her domestic market. She serves customers very gently and has permanent clients. 

She wants to widen her business and has appealed to IMON for a loan to buy a collection of kid’s clothing. She hopes to have a progressive business in order to ensure her family’s needs of food and clothes.

loans.use: to buy a collection of kid’s clothing.

loans.name: Marisabel

texts.es: Marisabel tiene dos hijos es casada tiene 34 años de edad tiene 2 hijos ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado solicita el crédito para comprar animales para criarlos y luego vender para asi tener alguna ganancia y aumentar su capital de trabajo, realiza las compras en Guaranda en el merdaco de animales cada 8 días, su sueño es tener un tabajo estable, el desafio al que se enfrenta es la falta de medios de transporte, en su tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a su familia.
texts.en:
Marisabel is 34 years old and married. She has two children. Marisabel makes a living buying and selling cattle. She is applying for this loan in order to buy animals to raise and later sell. She can thereby make a profit and increase her assets. 

Marisabel buys her cattle at the animal market in Guaranda every week. Her dream is to have a stable job. One challenge facing Marisabel is the lack of transport. In her spare time, Marisabel likes to spend time with her family.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to sow corn and buy firewood.

loans.name: Miguel De Jesus

texts.es:
Miguel de 27 años de edad, está soltero y sin hijos, vive con su madre y su hermana, ellas dos son la única familia que tiene y se siente en la obligación de protegerlas y cuidarlas.  


Miguel trabaja como empleado de una ferretería, es el encargado de transportar los materiales y los pedidos a los clientes, lleva un buen tiempo dedicándose a esto y le ha estado yendo bien ya que le sirve para sus gastos y para mantener a su familia.


Él necesita este crédito para terminar de poner el piso en su casa, ya que se acerca el invierno y el agua se mete al piso de tierra.

Él sueña con formar su propia familia pero sin dejar atrás a su madre y a su hermana ya que han sido pilares muy importantes  a lo largo de su vida.
texts.en:
Miguel is 27 years old, single and has no children. He lives with his mother and sister. They are his only family and Miguel feels obliged to protect and look after them.

Miguel works at a DIY shop. He is responsible for delivering materials to customers. He has been doing this work for some time now and it has been going very well and has allowed him to earn money to cover expenses and support his family.

Miguel needs this loan in order to finish laying the floor in his house as winter is approaching and water is seeping into the earth floor.

Miguel dreams of starting his own family. At the same time, he does not want to live his mother and sister behind as they have been a great support throughout his life.

loans.use: to finish laying the floor in his house as winter is approaching and water is seeping into the earth floor.

loans.name: Ana Griselda

texts.es:
Ana, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está casada y tiene dos hijos.

Ana, se dedica a los oficios de la casa y a la agricultura, su esposo es transportista, él hace viajes con su vehículo.-

Ana, necesita el dinero para comprar abono, semilla y venenos para que su esposo siembre sandía, ya que tiene muchos años de experiencia, desde muy niño comenzó a trabajar la agricultura. 

Sus sueños son salir adelante con su familia y vivir en un lugar seguro para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana is 25 years old and has an eighth-grade education. She is married and has two children.

Ana takes care of the household chores and is also a farmer. Her husband is a vehicle driver.

Ana needs this loan in order to buy manure, seeds and poison so that her husband can grow watermelons. Having been working in farming since he was a child, Ana’s husband has a lot of experience in growing this fruit.

Ana’s dreams are to move forward with her family and to live in a place that is safe for her children.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds and poison so that her husband can grow watermelons.

loans.name: Zamin

texts.en:
Zamin is 25 years old, single, and lives with his parents. The family lives in the Baku region. Zamin is a taxi driver, and he transports passengers between the Baku region. Now he needs a loan in an amount of 900 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to repair the car's motor. 

This is Zamin's second loan, and he closed the first loan on time. He greatly thanks Kiva partners and lenders for the aid. In the future, he wants to get married and have a child.

loans.use: to repair the car's motor to increase business. In the future, he wants to get married and have a child.

loans.name: Mahzuna

texts.ru: Махзуна жительница района Н. Хусрав. Ей 30 лет. Она замужем и имеет одну дочку. Дочке 4 лет. Махзуна на районе живет вместе мамой, папой, мужем, сестрой, сестренкой и дочкой. У нее не очень большая семья. Махзуна работает медсестрой в больнице, и она свободное время занимается растениеводством у себя во дворе. Она выращивает растение уже 4 года. Для нее данная деятельность является основным источником дохода. Махзуна каждый сезон сажает урожай. Работать на земле тяжело, но Махзуна несмотря ни на, что работает в этом направлении, чтобы зарабатывать и обеспечить семью. Она просит кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений, чтобы отработать землю ими. Махзуна верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Mahzuna is a resident of Nosiri Khusrav. She is 30 years old. She is married and has one daughter, who is 4 years old. Mahzuna lives in the region together with her mother, father, husband, sisters and daughter. She does not have a very big family. Mahzuna works as a nurse in the hospital, and in her free time works on her land. She has already been growing plants for four years. This work is the main source of income for her. Every season, Mahzuna plants her harvest. Working on the land is hard, but in spite of this, Mahzuna does so in order to make a living and provide for her family. She is asking for a loan to buy mineral fertilizers, in order to use them on her land. Mahzuna believes in you and your support.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers to till her land.

loans.name: Elizenith

texts.es: Elizenith de 32 años de edad,  emprendió su negocio de bordados y manualidades en el año 2007,  después de haber recibido capacitación y tener un certificado de aptitud profesional en éste arte, decidió dedicarse a estas manualidades con el propósito de generar recursos adicionales para su familia, alterno a esta actividad ella también comercializa productos cárnicos a sus vecinos y amigos.  Su proceso productivo consiste en elaborar el bordado a mano en camisas, blusas, cubrelechos y toallas, este servicio lo ofrece desde su casa todos los días en el horario de 2 p.m. a 5 p.m.   Elizenith es madre de tres hijos de 2, 6 y 10 años, ella planifica muy bien su tiempo y para cumplir con todos sus compromisos, ya que por las cortas edades de sus hijos demandan mucho tiempo y cuidado.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar hilos de diferentes tonalidades, agujas, telas y tambores para bordar y comprará productos cárnicos.  Elizenith considera que esta inversión incrementará sus ventas y podrá promover variedad en el surtido. Sus metas familiares están encaminadas a velar por la una buena educación para sus hijos y un mejor futuro, así mismo a largo plazo desea tener un taller de confecciones.
texts.en:
Elizenith is 32 years old.  She learned her business of embroidering and handicrafts in the year 2007, after having received training and getting a certificate of professional aptitude in this art.  She decided to dedicate herself to these handicrafts with the purpose of generating additional resources for her family.  Alternating with this occupation, she also markets meat products to her neighbours and friends.

Her productive process consists of hand-embroidering on shirts, blouses, bed covers and towels.  She offers this service from her house every day between 2pm and 5pm.   She is the mother of three children aged 2, 6, and 10.  She plans her time very well to be able to complete all of her commitments since, due to the young age of her children, they need much time and care.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing that she has done with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, to buy thread in different shades, needles, fabric, and embroidery frames in order to embroider and she will also buy meat products.

Elizenith considers that this investment will increase her sales and she will be able to promote variety in the selection.  Her family goals are guided by looking after a good education and a better future for her children.  In addition, in the long-term, she would like to have a clothing shop.

loans.use: to buy threads of different shades, needles, fabric, and embroidery frames in order to embroider and she will also buy meat products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy livestock to fatten and sell which will improve her business

loans.name: Soeurn's Group

texts.en:
Soeurn, 55, is a married mother of a child, living in Kampong Cham province. Growing rice on a 3-hectare farmland has been the source of her family’s income for 37 years. 

She is now leading a group to apply for this loan, with her portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming. She hopes that she can earn more income and have a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Yoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Yoeurn, 53, is a mother of two children, living in Kampong Cham province. Growing rice and a construction worker are the sources of her family’s income for more than five years. It earns her about 45,000KHR per day. 

Due to lack of fund, she is now leading a group to take a new Kiva loan via VisionFund with her portion to buy fertilizer. She hopes to gain more profits through this loan.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice field to ensure a better yield

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Nilgün

texts.en:
Nilgün is married and has two children, ages six and four.  She says she is not working because her children are small and need to be taken care of.  

But in order to make a contribution to the family budget, she is selling Amway products to her friends and relatives.  With her second loan, she is planning to buy more Amway products and sell them.  Her dream is, when the children grow a bit more, to open a shop, earn more money and provide better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy more Amway products for re-sale to help the family budget

loans.name: Fedaa

texts.en: Fedaa is 21 years old and lives with her parents and seven siblings in a sector of Jordan called Irbid. She is a university student majoring in childcare, and she is in her third year. Fedaa is planning to find a better job after graduation and earn a better income in order to support her family. However, because of the financial crisis her family has been facing, she wasn't able to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she applied for this loan. And now she needs your support to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
Abel tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte de Oyotún a Chiclayo y viceversa, cuenta con más de 1 año de antiguedad en el negocio y buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará para realizar reparaciones y arreglos a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, el espera mejorar la calidad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Abel is 30-years old. He is married and lives with his family in Oyotún District, a rural area dedicated to agriculture and livestock. Oyotún District is located in the Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region on Perú's northern coast.

Abel makes his living offering transportation services from Oyotún to Chiclayo and vice-a-verse. He has been in the business for more than a year and has good personal and work references in his district. Abel will use the loan to make repairs to and fix up his vehicle, as it is currently in disrepair. He hopes to improve the quality of his services and be able to tend to the diverse needs of his local customers. This will generate a greater income for him, which will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs to and fix up his vehicle, which is currently is disrepair.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to supply milk to his clients.

loans.name: Sadafmo

texts.en:
Sadafmo is one of the responsible and hardworking women of the Pyandj district. She is 32 years old, married and a mother of 2 children. Sadafmo has been engaged in agriculture for 6 years. She works hard as this is the main source of income for her and her family. Her husband is also involved in agriculture. They are trying to provide their children with a good life conditions. 

Now Sadafmo wants to plant a new crop. For this she needs to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer. Unfortunately Sadafmo does not have enough money, but she believes that with the help of Kiva lenders she will be able to expand her activity.

Dear Lenders, please help Sadafmo, who is hoping to your support.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizer, so as to have a good crop and support her family better

loans.name: Savoeun's Group

texts.en:
Savoeun is aged 59 years and a mother of six children  She lives in Kampong Cham province. Todays, she grows rice on one hectare of farmland and cassava on six hectares for more than ten years. Working for other farm in an additional source of her family’s income. Through these businesses she could earn about 79,000KHR per day. 

Because of her crops did not grow well, it depreciated her income and now she is faced with a problem - lack of funds for the farm. 

Due to this reason, she decided to lead a group to take a new Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for labor fee. 

She hopes to gain more yields than last year and expand her farming area.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for labor fee. This will improve her family welfare

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sokchea's Group

texts.en:
Sokchea is living in a rural area of Kampong Cham province, and is a mother of five children.  Her family’s living has depended on cassava farming and growing mushrooms to sell, for more than 10 years. 

Now she is leading a group, applying for a new loan with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. She will use her loan portion to buy seeds and to pay for plowing fees to do farming. She hopes to improve her living condition via expanding her current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and to pay for plowing fees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Abdel Hameed

texts.en:
Abdel Hameed is a 37-year-old married man from Rafah city. He works as an employee in the public sector. Abdel earns a low income, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs. Abdel would like to improve his family's living conditions and buy everything that they need.

Abdel took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family's house. This will enable him to provide clean water for his family.

Abdel appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for his family's house.

loans.name: Alejandro Jr

texts.en:
Alejandro Jr works the land and grows rice. He is engaged in rice farming.  He is 39 year old, married with three dependents. In addition to that, he also raises and sells hogs. Due to financial problem, he decided to take a loan.

He  is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers for the farm, piglets and pig feed.  These will improve his farming livelihood and could gain higher yield. He could now raise and sells quality pigs in a few months.

With these, he could now expand both businesses.  He is dedicated enough to manage it properly for the improvement of the family's living conditions and to support the needs of his growing children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the farm, piglets and pig feed - this will help support his growing children

loans.name: Mahina

texts.en:
Mahina is a hardworking woman. She was born in the north-west part of Tajikistan in 1984. She is living in a pretty city where is situated a seventh color lake and big scale mountains. She is married and has three children. 

About four years she started a business of sewing for women. She is a tailor. She sews traditional women dresses and has permanent clients. She wants to buy a sewing machine and enlarge her business. 

She requested a loan from Kiva lenders and IMON to buy a sewing machine. She awaits you kindness. She dreams to be sewing fabrics in the future.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine so that she can continue to produce traditional women's dresses

loans.name: Medina

texts.ru: Медина, 26 лет, замужем, детей нет. У нее высшее образование. В настоящее время занимается сельским хозяйством, по хозяйству помогает муж. Медина с большой ответственностью относится к своему делу. Ежегодно обрабатывает 1,48 Га земли, выращивает фасоль. Медина обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на полеводческие цели. Доходы от кредита Медина направит на дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Medina is 26 years old, and married with no children. She has a higher education. She currently works in agriculture, and her husband helps on the farm. Medina carries out her work with great responsibility. Every year she grows haricot on 1.48 hectares of land. Medina applied to the bank Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) for agricultural purposes. Income from the loan will allow Medina to further develop her business.

loans.use: to cultivate her land in order to grow organic haricot.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and meet the demands of his clients

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a 55-year-old man and he supports four family members. He has been in the business of metal construction supplies for the past 15 years and the business earns him a monthly income of 13,000 KES.

Henry has applied for his first loan of 25,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya to purchase more metals for use in his work. He plans to use the gained profit to repay the loan and to educate his children.

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase more metals for use in his work.

loans.name: Heyam

texts.en:
Heyam is a conservative woman and asked her son to take her place in the photo. She is 53 years old and a caring mother of eight kids. For a big family consisting of 10 members, it is difficult to ensure all its needs. Her sons are working beside their education to save their daily expenses, but Heyam’s husband cannot cover all household expenses, therefore she started her own business to provide support to her husband and her kids.

She started commerce in poultry. She is a very ambitious woman and wants to be productive. She said that she is not working just because she needs this work, but even if she did not need that income, she would open her own business to be a productive woman and to be an example to all woman in her region.

She feels that this working earns her good income, so she is thinking of developing her work. Therefore, she has decided to apply for a loan to help her expand her business, and to buy more poultry to sell and more supplies that she needs to improve the quality of her work.

loans.use: to expand her business and buy more poultry to sell, and more supplies that she needs to improve the quality of her work.

loans.name: Naiyoeun's Group

texts.en:
Naiyoeun, 35, is a mother of three small children, living in Kampong Cham province. Her family’s living is now depending on cassava farming and working for other farms for a fee, for more than five years. She could earn about 54,000KHR per day. 

Now she has not enough funds to work the farm, so she decided to lead a group to apply for a Kiva loan with her portion to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees. She hopes to gain more yields and expand her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Oem's Group

texts.en: Oem, 51, is a mother of three children, of which two are in school. She lives in Kampong Cham province. To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows cassava on three hectares of  farmland and grows rice on half a hectare of farmland. To earn additional income, she also works for other farms for a fee. She has been involved in this business for more than five years and it earns her about 53,000KHR per day. Due to a lack of funds, she is now leading a group to take a new loan via VisionFund, Kiva’s partner, to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fee. She hopes to gain more yields and the ability to buy more farmland to expand her farming area.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for plowing fee

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her butchery business, by re-stocking a variety of different kinds of meat like pork,mutton, beef and goat meat

loans.name: Laila

texts.en:
Laila is 32-years-old married woman from Tubas, a small village near Nablus. Leila is a mother of a son and daughter. She lives with her husband and children in a small humble house. Her husband is a worker where he gets a low-income. 

Two years ago, Laila opened her own small sewing operation and she started  to sell and repair clothes. 

Laila took a USD loan from FATEN to buy a new sewing machine, yarns and fabrics.  This loan will help Leila to improve production and also increase sales.
Laila appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, yarns and fabrics

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is 62 years old, married to Margaret, and supports 9 family members. 

He has been a farmer for the last 29 years and the business earns him a monthly income of KES 11,000.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya. He plans to purchase pesticides and herbicides so as to improve his agricultural produce and meet the demands of customers in the market. 

He plans to use his profit to repay the loan and expand his agricultural sector. 

His hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides and herbicides so as to improve his agricultural produce

loans.name: Slaiman

texts.en:
Slaiman is 52 years old, and he lives in the southern part of Jordan. He is married.

Slaiman is working hard to provide a living for his family and to ensure good education for his kids. 

He wakes up early and goes to collect scrap to sell it to the scrap shops, Slaiman wants to buy a wagon for scraps to protect it from thieves, but he does not have enough money to buy one. Therefore, he is applying for a loan to help him buy a wagon and expand his work, in order to increase his income and improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to help him buy a wagon and expand his work.

loans.name: Yong's Group

texts.en: Yong is 46 years old and a mother of three children. She is a villager living in Kampong Thom province, and to overcome her family’s hardship, she has been selling grocery items and rice farming for ten years. Due to lack of funds, she is now leading her group to apply for a Kiva loan via VisionFund to fulfill her needs, specifically to build a private toilet for her family. She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to build a private toilet

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en:
Brenda owns and manage a sari-sari(variety) store. She sells various goods such as noodles, coffee , cooking oil, eggs, shampoo, powdered soap, soft drinks and canned goods.  She is a 45-year-old married woman with three dependents. Her youngest child is 11 and still attending school. 

Brenda  is asking  a loan to buy supplies for the store like canned goods, soft drinks and liquor. These will improve the content of her store and attract more buyers to shop. Thus, it will slowly increase her sales and able to balance her finances. With these, she could now expand her business and do expansion to become more sustainable.


In the future,  she hopes that she will be able to continue to send her youngest child to school for a brighter tomorrow.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the store like canned goods, soft drinks and liquor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy new a sewing machine to better serve his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and increase the number of litres of milk supplied to his customers

loans.name: Nour

texts.en:
Nour is a 32-year-old married man from Rafah city. He works as an employee in the public sector. Nour earns a low income, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs. Nour would like to improve his family's living conditions and buy everything that they need.

Nour took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family's house. This will enable him to provide clean water for his family.

Nour appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for his family's house.

loans.name: Sida's Group

texts.en:
Sida, 33, is a mother of a child, and living in a village of Kampong Cham province. The source of her family’s income is from rubber plant farming on a 3-hectare farmland and paid work is an additional income source of her family. She has been involved with this business for 15 years. 

Due to lack of funds to create a new business, she is now leading a group to apply for a loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She will use her loan portion to buy cashew nut seeds for growing cashew nut trees. She wishes to earn more money through this new business.

loans.use: to buy cashew nut seeds for growing cashew nut trees.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sambok's Group

texts.en:
Residing in Kampong Cham province, Sambok is a 43-year-old mother of two children, one of whom is in school, while the other is yet too young to attend. She has been growing rice and cassava for more than five years, earning about 28,000KHR per day to support her family. 

Sambok is now leading a group of two to request a loan with VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farming. She hopes her crops will provide  greater yields than last year.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Sagynbubu

texts.ru: Сагынбубу, 56 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 3 детей. У Сагынбубу высшее образование, работает преподавателем математики в школе, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством, около 15 лет. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Сагынбубу, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 1,50 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Также у Сагынбубу в хозяйстве есть 7 коров и 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход от реализации сельскохозяйственной экологически чистой продукции, в том числе молока составляет до 10,000 сом (KGS). Сагынбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец. Сагынбубу намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en: Sagynbubu is 56 years old, married, and has raised three children with her partner. Sagynbubu has a higher education, and works as a mathematics teacher in a school. For additional income for her family, she has worked in animal husbandry and crop cultivation for around 15 years. Thanks to Sagynbubu's persistence, single-mindedness and hard work, today she has 1.50 hectares of her own land, where she grows haricot for sale. In addition, Sagynbubu has seven cows and twenty sheep on her farm. Her monthly income from the sale of organic agricultural produce, including milk, is up to 10,000 som (KGS). Sagynbubu applied to the bank Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy ten sheep. Sagynbubu intends to expand her business, which will inevitably lead to an increase in the family's capital.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Ghada

texts.en:
Ghada is 38 years old and lives in the southern part of Jordan. She is married and she has two children. She is a conservative woman and asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Ghada wants to meet the needs of her children, and she dreams that their future will be full of success and excellence. All those wishes depend on the financial situation of her family, so she started commerce in her house a few years ago. She opened a grocery store in an empty room in her house and started to sell general products to help her husband in the household expenses and achieve her dreams.

She wants to expand her work to increase her income so she asked for a loan to help her buy what she needs and buy more products to sell. She dreams of opening a shop independent of her home, and building a new home.

loans.use: to help her buy what she needs and buy more products to sell.

loans.name: Ramech

texts.en:
Ramech is a new client at Ugafode who is applying for a loan of UGX.3000000. He needs the loan to boost his coffee business by buying and selling at a profit. 

Ramech aged 47 years, married with 4 children, He is a resident of Rukungiri district. Ramech’s main activity is agricultural produce business mainly coffee, beans and maize. He says it’s a profitable business but his challenge has been limited capital, more especially like this time of coffee harvest. 

He hopes to reap much from this coffee season with the use of this loan and he is glad that this time around the issue of self sustenance and challenges of children’s school fees will be something of the past..He thanks UGAFODE for this wonderful financial support.

loans.use: To buy and sell coffee, beans and maize, which will support his family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more timber for use in his work.

loans.name: Bunafsha

texts.en:
Bunafsha is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1978. She lives in the small town of Vahdat, which is attractive to tourists due to its geographical location. Vahdat city and its surroundings are of interest primarily for hikers on mountain massifs. 

Bunafsha is married and has three children. She has many years of experience buying and selling children’s clothes in the domestic market. She has a place of doing business in the domestic market and has permanent customers. She wants to expand her business in order to earn income to feed her family. 

She is asking for a loan from Kiva lenders to buy a new collection of children’s clothes for resale. She hopes that her business will give her more opportunity to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of children’s clothes for resale.

loans.name: Rayhona

texts.en:
Rayhona is a hard-working woman. She was born in the northwestern part of Tajikistan in 1986. She is living in a rural area with her family. She is married and has three children. 

Rayhona has many years of experience doing business in agriculture. She was taught from her childhood how to keep livestock. She likes to care about livestock. She started her business with three livestock and she fed them to sell in the future. She is a goal-oriented person and she wants to repair her house. 

Her house is an old one from the Soviet Union and it needs to be renovated. Rayhona does not have the money for renovations and she asks for a loan from Kiva lenders to buy construction supplies. She hopes Kiva lenders will support her and she can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to renovate her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his butchery business by restocking different kinds of meat like pork, mutton, beef and goat meats.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.ru: Зайнаб жительница сельской местности. Она всю свою жизнь прожила в селе и с детства занималась животноводством. Это занятие передалось ей по наследству от отца. Ее отец тоже занимался животноводством и передал дочери свой скот. Животноводство стало для семьи Зайнаб основным источником дохода. Муж Зайнаб занимается земледелием на своем поле площадью в 1 га. Он сажает там пшеницу и кукурузу. В зимнее время он помогает жене по хозяйству и уходу за животными. Еще на муже лежит ответственность за куплю продажу скота. В данный момент бизнес Зайнаб нуждается в финансовой поддержке и с этой проблемой она решила обратиться в "АРВАНД" за поддержкой. На полученные деньги она хочет купить молодой скот и корм для скота.
texts.en: Zainab resides in the countryside. She has spent all of her life living in the country and has worked in animal husbandry since childhood. This occupation was passed down to her by her father. Her father also worked in animal husbandry and gave his daughter his cattle. Animal husbandry became the main source of income for Zainab's family. Zainab's husband works in arable farming on his own plot of land of 1 hectare. He plants wheat and maize there. In the winter, he helps his wife on the farm and caring for the animals. The responsibility of buying and selling cattle also rests on her husband. At the moment, Zainab's business needs financial support, and because of this problem she decided to apply to 'Arvand' for support. Upon receiving the money, she wants to buy young cattle and fodder.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a cow to feed it with napier grass she has planted for increased milk production and meet the demands of clients.

loans.name: Boren

texts.en:
Boren is a 20-year-old single student, and he is from the Prey Veng Province in Cambodia. He is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in electrical engineering, and is in his second year at a university in the city. His parents are rice farmers. 

Because Boren is short of finances to cover his tuition fees from the second to the fourth year, he would like to request a loan. With this loan, he will be able to cover his university fees and earn a bachelor’s degree successfully. 

His dream is to have a proper job with a decent salary, so that he will be able to save enough money to build his own house.

loans.use: to cover his tuition fees from the second to the fourth years.

loans.name: Safura

texts.en:
Safura is divorced and she has two children. She has a small store, where she sells daily food and cleaning products. 

Her daughter was married three years ago. Today Safura lives with her son and his bride. She has a lovely grandchild. They are living in Fuzuli region, but for the past 23 years, they have been IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city. 

Today, Safura wants to support her business and therefore she has applied to Komak for a loan in amount of 1,800 AZN to buy products to support the development of her business. She says she is thankful to Kiva for the aid. 

In the future Safura wants to help to her son build a house.

loans.use: to buy products to support the development of her business.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
To be able to raise her five children, Marlyn, 47, from Coron, Palawan, is very passionate and hardworking in operating her current business, a beauty parlor. With her expert skills in grooming and making people more attractive, it yields more customers for her services. Through this, she earns a living. And what income she gets in her trade is just enough to support the entire household.

Aspiring to grow her business and be successful, Marlyn wants to ask for a loan worth 11,000 PHP, which she will use to buy more beauty products for her shop. This will indeed be a great help for her and for her family in providing for their daily expenses and necessities. Your help can mean a lot now to Marlyn. In advance, we want to thank you for your consideration and unwavering generosity. 

Marlyn regularly meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products for her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and farm tools for her farming activities so as to get a better harvest and meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo, de 32 años de edad, es agricultor y comerciante de ganado desde hace 10 años, mientras trabajaba para otras personas, conoció el negocio y decidió ponerlo en práctica, ahora tiene mucha experiencia, está acompañado, tiene 4 hijos.

Alfredo, necesita el dinero para comprar ganado, para revenderlo, ya que en este tiempo mucha gente quiere venderlos porque no hay pasto para los animales y él con su experiencia sabe dónde comprar y donde vender. 

El sueña con hacer crecer en su negocio y que su familia viva en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 32 years old. He has been a farmer and cattle trader for 10 years. While he was working for other people, he became familiar with the business and decided to put it into practice. Now he has a lot of experience. He is married and has 4 children. 

Alfredo needs the money to buy cattle and resell it, since at this time many people want to sell them because there is no pasture for the animals and with his experience he knows where to buy and where to sell. 

He dreams of making his business grow and that his family lives in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Soeup's Group

texts.en:
Soeup, 56, is a father of seven children, living in Battambang province. Rice farming has been the source of his family’s income for 12 years, and it earns him about 59,000 KHR per day. 

Now. he is leading a group to apply for this loan. With his portion, he will buy seeds for his farm. He hopes to earn more money and expand his current business.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Chhan's Group

texts.en: Chhan has been a cassava farmer and a paid worker for eight years, living in Kratie province. She is 32 years old and a mother of two children who are both in school. She earns about 76,000 KHR per day. Due to lack of funds, she is now leading a group of four to apply for a Kiva loan through VisionFund to pay the plowing fee. She hopes to earn more money and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to pay the plowing fee

loans.name: Shameem

texts.en:
Shameem, 46 years old, is a very enthusiastic person who has been successfully running a small general store along with her husband who is also shown in the photo. She offers a variety of daily-use products and has a good client base. In order to avoid shortages, Shameem needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand.

Shameem has requested a loan of PKR 45,000 to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices etc. to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices etc. to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.name: Meng's Group

texts.en:
Meng has been a cassava farmer and a paid worker for three years. She is 27 years old and a mother of two children. One of her children is in school while the other one is too young. They live in Kratie province. She can earn about 83,000 KHR per day.

This is the first loan for her group which consists of three members. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to pay for plowing and labor fees.

She hopes to earn more money and have the ability to send her children to school.

loans.use: to pay for plowing and labor fees.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia has successfully built her beauty salon with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. She has attained a good number of customers and makes good income to support her family. Previously, with the help of Kiva, she was able to expand her business. Now, she has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase combs, hair straightener, make-up kits, and cleansers for treating many customers at a time to earn more income, benefiting her household.

loans.use: to purchase combs, hair straightener, make-up kits, and cleansers for treating many customers at a time to earn more income.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 24 years old, married to Damackline and supports a family of four.

He has been practicing small-scale farming for the last 10 years, earning an income of KES 8,500 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting. This will help him to improve his farming activity and eventually raise his family's living standards.

He plans to use his profits to repay his loan and educate his children. 

His future hope is to lead a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Asmat

texts.en: Asmat  is a 42-year-old, married woman. She has eight children. Asmat  is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery and has been using this skill for many years to earn a living. She can make beautiful designs and patterns with her hand. Her skill is known throughout the town. Her husband (also shown in the photo) also assists her in completing orders of their customers on time. She has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. This loan will enable her  to purchase more beads, threads, frames to meet orders of her customers on time to earn good amount of profits. This monetary help can take Asmat  closer to her dream of providing quality education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more beads, threads, and frames to meet orders of her customers.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe engages in hog raising as her main source of income. Almost three years now she has been engaged in the hog-raising business. She is 42 years old, married and has four children, ages 4 to 14.

Fe has requested a loan to purchase additional piglets and pig feed.  With this loan, she will augment her hog-raising business. And, in a few months, she will sell quality hogs, which will improve her income and enable her to balance her finances.

In the future, she dreams of expanding her business to make it productive and profitable to support the needs of her growing children, including quality education.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets and pig feed

loans.name: Banco Mujer Fuentes De Vida Group

texts.es: Sandra es una joven con 28 años de edad,casada y con dos hijos. Sus 2 niños están cursando la primaria. Es integrante del Banco Mujer Fuentes de Vida ubicado en la Esmeralda de Siquirres, es una comunidad rural. Inició su actividad de criar cerdos para luego venderlos en su comunidad, con la finalidad de generar ingresos al hogar sin descuidar a su familia y, además de pagarse sus estudios. Actualmente está cursando el noveno año por madurez. Su meta es estudiar para lograr mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Cuenta con el apoyo de sus esposo en las decisiones a tomar. El crédito lo va invertir en comprar cerdos, asi generar más ingresos y salir adelante. Junto con ésta socia está otra señora que va invertir en la avicultura. Ellas buscan superarse y crecer en las diferentes actividades económicas que realizan.
texts.en:
Sandra is a young 28 year old woman. She is married and has two children. Her 2 children are in primary school. She is a member of the Banco Mujer Fuentes de Vida, located in Esmeralda de Siquirres. It is a rural community. She began her business of growing pigs to later sell them in her community, in order to generate income at home without neglecting her family, and in addition to paying her studies.  She is currently attending her 9th year of school as an adult. 

Her goal is to study in order to improve her living conditions. She counts on the support of her husband on which decisions to make. She will invest the loan in buying pigs and thus generate more income and get ahead. Together with this partner is another woman who is going to invest in poultry. They are looking to overcome and grow in the different business activities that they carry out.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en:
Kousar is a 40-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband at the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop. Over time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and they make enough to meet the expenses of their four children.

She has requested a loan of 40,000 Pakistan rupees (PKR) to purchase more grocery items, including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea, to cater to maximum customers and to generate a healthier source of income. She is positive about her future earnings and will spend part of her income on buying more items for her store.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items including grains, peas, flour, sugar and tea.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in pants, skirts, dresses, blouses, lotions, deodorants, etc., to supply her commodity.

loans.name: Ulfat

texts.en:
Ulfat is a 49-year-old married lady who has run a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Ulfat makes enough to provide for her family.

To make her store fully stocked she requested for a loan of 50,000 Pakistan rupees (PKR) which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Ulfat wishes to utilize part of her revenues to provide a good quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers.

loans.name: Gulira

texts.ru: Гулира, 40 лет, в разводе, воспитывает 2 детей. Образование высшее, Гулира занимается торговлей одеждой с 1993 года, начав этот бизнес с 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря ее неустанному труду и выдержке на сегодняшний день Гулира получает ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 17,500 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь. Поэтому Гулира решила развить свое дело и обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одежды для продажи. На доходы от кредита Гулира планирует улучшить материальное благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Gulira is 40 years old, divorced, and is raising two children. She has a higher education. Gulira has worked in the clothing trade since 1993, having started this business with 15,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her tireless hard work, today Gulira has a monthly profit of 17,500 som (KGS), but this is not means enough for a dignified life. Therefore Gulira decided to develop her business and applied to the bank Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy clothes for resale. With income from the loan, Gulira plans to improve the material well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale in order to increase her profit and her family's income.

loans.name: Trebol-21 Group

texts.es:
Susy es una mujer de 37 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos de 12 y 10 años, y su negocio es la venta de verduras.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, independiente, paciente, optimista, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘Pedregal’ caracterizada por ser la entrada a un mirador de la ciudad, posee una elevación rocosa monolítica natural de 150 metros de altura, que se destaca en el entorno paisajístico de la zona, tiene forma de una gran muela; ascendiendo a la cima se tiene una vista única de la ciudad y sus alrededores. La vegetación consiste en pastizales y arbustos bajos. En cuanto a la fauna, se tienen algunas aves como los gorriones y el ave María. 
Susy es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (fila de atrás, la segunda de la derecha, viste polera cuello bitle rosa y chamarra marrón). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja en carpintería y con sus hijos; ambos estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa alquilada, construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Debido a sus sueños de superación formó una banca de personas con negocios como; artesanía en yeso, fabricación de instrumentos musicales, venta de cremas, tienda de barrio, venta de comida y venta de carne, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de verduras como; arveja, haba, ajo, cebolla, frijol, tomate, zanahoria, zapallo, etc. Actividad que realiza en su puesto de venta fijo al aire libre todos los días de la semana, “aprendí el negocio de mi mamá, toda mi vida me he dedicado a lo mismo…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que es independiente y le deja tiempo para compartir con su familia, la desventaja es que el espacio del negocio es pequeño. Su sueño es tener un puesto de venta amplio donde pueda vender con mayor facilidad, ella desea realizar la compra de verduras por mayor para ofertar mayor variedad y cantidad. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 13 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Susy solicita un préstamo para la compra de verdura por mayor para abrir un puesto de venta amplio.
texts.en:
Susy is a thirty-seven year old woman, she lives with her partner. She has two children, ages twelve and ten, and her business is selling vegetables. 
She is a good mother, enterprising, independent, patient, optimistic, responsible and very hard-working. She runs her business in the 'Pedregal' area, known for being the entry point to a commanding view of the city, it has a naturally rocky, monolithic elevation 150 meters high, which stands out in the landscape, it has the form of a large tooth; ascending to its highest point provides a unique view of the city and its surroundings. The vegetation consists of grassy lands and low shrubs. As for wildlife, there are birds such as sparrows and Ave Maria birds. 
Susy has a dark complexion, long black hair, brown eyes, and is short-statured and slender. Her native tongue is Aymara which she speaks with her family, and she speaks Spanish in the general culture and for her business. She is in the back row in the photo, second from the right, wearing a pink shirt and brown sweatshirt. She shares her life with her partner who works as a carpenter and with their children; they both attend school. They live in a rented house, constructed of brick, with a corrugated roof, and they have running water, electricity, gas and a sewage system. Because of her dreams to better herself, she joined a communal bank comprised of people with businesses such as: artisanal plaster work, making musical instruments, selling creams, running a neighborhood store, selling food and selling meat; to solicit a loan and improve her business. Her business is selling vegetables such as peas,beans, garlic, onions, black beans, tomatoes, carrots, and pumpkins. She runs her business from her open-air stall seven days a week. "I learned the business from my mother, I have done it all my life…" she remarks. The advantage of her work is she is independent, and it allows her time to spend with her family. The disadvantage is the space for her business is small. Her dream is to have a large market stall where she can sell more easily. She would like to buy vegetables at wholesale in order to offer more variety and greater quantities. This is the second loan with the institution in thirteen years dedicated to this activity. 
These are the reasons Susy is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables at wholesale to open a larger market stall.

loans.use: to buy vegetables at wholesale and open a large market stall

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas, 35 years old, is married to Rhoda and supports a family of four members.

He has been practicing small scale farming for the last six years, earning an income of KES 7,500 per month. He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting. This will help him improve his farming activity and improve his family's living standards.

He plans to use the gained profits to repay his loan and educate his children.

His future hope is to lead a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his wife's Caesarean section.

loans.name: Phorn's Group

texts.en: Phorn, 50, is a mother of four children, and only one of them is in school, living in Kratie province. Nowadays, her family’s living depends on growing cassava and working for other farms for a fee. She has been involved in these businesses for three years and, normally, it earns her about 85,000 Cambodia riel (KHR) per day. Due to her cassava not growing well, she is now faced with lacking funds. Now she decides to lead a group of two, applying for a loan with Kiva’s partner (VisionFund) with her portion to pay for a plowing fee. She hopes to earn more money and improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to pay for a plowing fee.

loans.name: Mehtab

texts.en:
Mehtab is 57 years old; she is a married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute in the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals to inflate her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to inflate her sales.

loans.name: Zoila Esperanza

texts.es: Zoila tiene 37 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante actividad que le permite sostener a su familia, desde hace 1 año, por lo que se siente feliz, ya que a pesar de tener poco en el mercado ya cuenta con una buena cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos, y cada día logra una mayor cantidad de clientes por su trato amable y precios justos. Zoila habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 3 hijos de 14, 11 y 3 años de edad. Zoila desea aumentar su mercadería ya que sabe que entre más variedad pueda ofrecer a su clientela mejores serán sus ventas y ganancias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, ropa interior y calcetines para surtir su mercadería.
texts.en:
Zoila is 37 years old and makes a living selling clothing as a street vendor. This work has allowed her to support her family for the last year, which makes her happy. Despite having little in the market, she already counts on a good quantity of clients that ask for her products, and every day she gets a larger number of clients because of her friendliness and fair prices. 

Zoila lives in her own home with her partner and her 3 children: 14, 11, and 3 years old. Zoila wants to increase her merchandise since she knows that the more variety she can offer her clientes, the better her sales and earnings will be. So, she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in pants, skirts, blouses, shirts, underwear and socks to supply her commodity.

loans.use: to invest in pants, skirts, blouses, shirts, underwear and socks to supply her commodity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Carlos Estuardo

texts.es: Carlos tiene 58 años de edad es casado tiene un hijo de 34 años viven en Guaranda, en la comunidad La Cria en la provincia de Bolivar, solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes agricolas ya que gracias a la ayuda de este credito podra hacer producir y luego comercializar el producto, hace las compras en Guaranda cada semana, su sueño es hacer producir sus parcelas para que crezca el negocio, en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer mingas y arreglar la casa.
texts.en: Carlos is 58 years old. He is married and has a 34-year-old son. They live in Guaranda, in the La Cría community in the province of Bolívar. He is requesting the loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies and fertilizers, since with it he will be able to produce and then market the product. He makes his purchases in Guaranda each week. His dream is to make his parcels produce so that the business grows. In his free time, he likes to do communal labor and make improvements to his house.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers to maintain his potato crop.

loans.name: Shabnam

texts.en:
Shabnam is a 36-year-old working woman. After her marriage, she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition. So, she started a business of selling clothes. She believes she can earn some respect and make a better world for her children and their education.

Shabnam is famous among her neighbors for her collections and has a good client list. Currently she needs a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment. This would lead her to live a decent life and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment.

loans.name: Calvin

texts.en:
Calvin is 32 years old and he supports eight family members. He has been a farmer for the last six years and the business earns him a monthly income of KES 8,000. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya, with which he plans to purchase fertilizers and farm tools to improve his agricultural produce and meet the demands of his customers. He plans to use gained profits to repay the loan and expand his agricultural sector. His hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and farm tools to improve his agricultural produce and meet the demands of his customers.

loans.name: Paraiso Group

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 60 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es emprendedora, constante, independiente, optimista, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en el barrio ‘paraiso’ un área céntrica que alberga a edificios de comercios, públicos, universidades, escuelas y todo tipo de áreas, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 18-35 grados centígrados.
Maria es de tez trigueña, ojos marrones, cabello gris largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (sentada a la derecha, viste pantalón rosa y solera verde. Su vida la comparte con sus familiares que trabajan. Viven en un cuarto propio construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su deseo por mejorar su actividad la llevó a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de verduras, venta de empanadas, venta de bisutería, tejido de carteras, ferretería, venta de cosméticos, carpintería y venta de revistas, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional como; majadito de charque (carne deshidratada, arroz, huevo frito y plátano frito), Cogote relleno (cuello de gallina criolla, relleno de papa o churiqui), Sopa de Remojado (sopa de huesos), y otros, labor que realiza en un ambiente improvisado como comedor en su domicilio, todos los días de la semana para la hora de almuerzo y la hora de cena. “levanto unas sombrillas, acomodo las mesas y preparo la comida de todos los días…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es la preferencia que tienen los pobladores por la comida tradicional. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante en su casa y mejorar la calidad de atención a sus clientes, ella desea realizar la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor, como; harina, arroz, fideo, yuca, papas, queso y otros. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor para cocinar platos típicos y abrir un restaurante.
texts.en:
Maria is 60 years old, single, she has no children, and her business is selling traditional food. She is an enterprising woman, tenacious, independent and optimist. She is responsible and she works very hard.

Her business is located in the Paraíso neighborhood, a central area of commercial and public buildings, universities, schools, with a good variety of surfaces. The climate is hot, tropical with daylight temperatures ranging from 18 to 35 degrees centigrade.

Maria is olive-skinned, with brown eyes and long gray hair that she wears tied back. She is short of stature with a medium build. Her mother tongue is Guaraní which is spoken at home, and she also speaks Spanish in the community and for her work. She is seated farthest to the right in the photo, wearing pink pants and a green top.

She shares her life with her family members. They work. They live in their own room built of brick and cement with a corrugated metal roof, and have potable water, electricity, and a sewage system.

Maria's desire to improve her work led her to form a group of business owners so they could request a loan and improve their businesses, which include vegetable sales, empanada sales, fashion jewellery sales, handbag knitting, hardware store, cosmetics sales, carpentry, and magazine sales.

Maria sells traditional food such as majaditos de charque (beef jerky, rice, fried eggs and fried plantains), cogote relleno (hen neck stuffed with potatoes or chicken livers), and sopa de remojado (bone soup), among other dishes. She prepares the food in her domicile, in a makeshift space serving as dining room daily during the lunch and dinner hours. "I set up some umbrellas, arrange the tables, and prepare the food for the  day", she comments. 

Her business advantage is that the local people have a preference for traditional food. She dreams of opening a restaurant in her home to improve the service to her clients.

She wants to buy cooking supplies at wholesale, such as flour, rice, pasta, yucca, potatoes, cheese, and more. This is the first loan with the institution in the ten years that she's been doing this work. She is requesting the loan to buy the supplies at wholesale so she can prepare her traditional dishes and open a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy cooking supplies at wholesale in order to prepare traditional dishes and open a restaurant.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida is a 24-year-old, married woman. She is a mother of four children. She has been doing a business of animal sales and purchases for many years. She earns enough through her business to run her household activities. 

Now, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan amount to purchase more cattle to sell in the market. She desires to improve her standard of living through all of her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle to sell in the market.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her child's school fee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her salon business by equipping it with relaxers, shampoo, hair conditioner and hair extensions.

loans.name: Firmino

texts.pt:
O senhor Firmino de 36 anos de idade, casado, trabalhador,  pai de 3 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino secundário, e 2 o ensino primário, tem também 1 cunhada na sua responsabilidade vive em casa própria.
Pretende com o valor do empréstimo comprar: pneus, para melhorar as condições do seu transporte  de passageiros.
O cliente tem como sonho, comprar mais viaturas para o transporte de passageiros , comprar um camião e concluir e ampliar a sua casa.
Seu  principal desafio é financeiro, tem recorrido ao xitique e ao empréstimo para suprir as suas dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos.
texts.en:
Firmino is 36 years old. He's married and in the workforce. He has three children, one of whom attends secondary school and two attend primary school. He's also responsible for his sister-in-law. He lives in a house that he owns.
With the amount of the loan he intends to purchase tires so that he can improve his passenger transportation services.
Firmino's dream is to buy more vehicles for carrying passengers. His other dream is to buy a truck and finish building and enlarging his house.
His main challenge is his finances. He has been using rotating credit and loans in order to overcome his struggles and achieve his goals.

loans.use: to purchase tires so that he can improve his passenger transportation services.

loans.name: Naeem

texts.en:
At the age of 55, Naeem is the mother of five children. She has been providing a flour grinding service in her community with the support of her husband. Her husband’s income is not sufficient to alone meet the needs of the family members, so she started this business in her home to contribute to the family income. She knows the techniques of grinding very well, and she has become famous for providing fine quality flour. She earns enough to support the needs of her family members.

In order to purchase a new grinding machine along with the stock of wheat, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR. It would help her to cater to more customers time after time, which ultimately would help in generating more cash. She wishes to spend part of her profits on better living conditions for her family members.

loans.use: to purchase a new grinding machine along with the stock of wheat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stock of fresh fruits and vegetables for resale at the market.

loans.name: Iamze

texts.en:
Iamze is a 36-year-old, married woman. She lives in Batumi district with her husband and two children. Her husband works at a wood workshop and produces furniture and gets 400 GEL monthly. Iamze wants to start working at a local beauty salon. 

The Startup program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 1,000 USD. With the received credit she will purchase a beauty set and will make a professional make-up. She will be able to generate her own income and provide  better living conditions for her children. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to open a beauty salon.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 37-year-old, married man from Rafah city. He works as an employee in the public sector. He gets a low income, which is not enough to cover all the family’s needs. Ahmad would like to improve his family living conditions and buy all of what they need.

Ahmad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for the family house. This will enable him to provide clean water for his family. Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for the family house.

loans.name: Muharram

texts.en: Muharram is a wise woman. She was born in the north-western part of Tajikistan into a family of farmers. She is living in a city of beautiful, scenic nature and fresh water. She is a widow. After her husband's death, she continued his business in agriculture. She is keeping livestock. Having the hills near her house means she has not needed to buy forage to keep the livestock. She likes this activity and it brings enough money to earn a living. She wants to buy two calves in order to expand her business. She asked for a loan from IMON and Kiva lenders to buy calves. She hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy two calves in order to expand her business

loans.name: Gizelle  Ann

texts.en:
Gizelle Ann is a 31-year-old married woman residing in the town of Talibon, Bohol. She has a 15-year-old son.

She runs a sari-sari (variety) store, selling basic commodities such as powdered milk, sugar, noodles, soft drinks, shampoo, seasonings, and beverages. She is out of funds to support her ongoing livelihood. Aside from running a store, she also raises hogs.

She is asking for a loan to buy assorted stock such as soft drinks, chips, liquor, noodles, and canned goods. These would be great for the family of Gizelle Ann to again fill the store with a variety of stock, and thus enable her to attract buyers to purchase. Thus, her earnings will improve and she will be able to manage her finances.

In the future, she hopes to successfully handle her business for a sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy assorted stock such as soft drinks, chips, liquor, noodles, and canned goods.

loans.name: Bashiran

texts.en:
Bashiran is 56 years old and a married woman. The man shown in the photo is Bashiran’s son, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family’s expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Bashiran has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR for her son. She wants to buy new tires, along with auto spare parts for her son's vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport services to his passengers.
